siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: TweetDeets gives you an insightful look at a Twitter account's activity. Instead of just a feed of tweets, you see their posting calendar, most frequent posting times, top words, posts by platform, and more in a clean, shareable report.
blogPost.body: TweetDeets gives you an insightful look at a Twitter account's activity. Instead of just a feed of tweets, you see their posting calendar, most frequent posting times, top words, posts by platform, and more in a clean, shareable report.
blogPost.title: TweetDeets - Simple, handy metrics for any public Twitter account
blogPost.author: Gregg Blanchard

localize.description: TweetDeets让你深入了解一个Twitter账户的活动。你可以在一个干净的、可分享的报告中看到他们的发帖日历、最频繁的发帖时间、最热门的词、按平台分类的帖子等，而不仅仅是一个推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter账户都有简单、方便的指标。

localize.description: TweetDeets讓你深入瞭解一個Twitter賬戶的活動。你可以在一個乾淨的、可分享的報告中看到他們的發帖日曆、最頻繁的發帖時間、最熱門的詞、按平臺分類的帖子等，而不僅僅是一個推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter賬戶都有簡單、方便的指標。

previous.excerpt: As you browse the Web Dashboard add-on tracks the time spent on each website. This data is then displayed in a visually intuitive and interactive manner. Understand your browsing and fight distractions! Privacy focus: Your data never leaves your computer!
previous.title: Web Dashboard - Track, visualize, and analyze your time spent online

localize.description: 当您浏览网页时，Web Dashboard插件会跟踪您在每个网站上花费的时间。这些数据会以直观和互动的方式显示。了解您的浏览情况，避免分心! 注重隐私：您的数据永远不会离开您的电脑!
localize.tagline: 追踪、可视化并分析您在网上花费的时间。

localize.description: 當您瀏覽網頁時，Web Dashboard插件會跟蹤您在每個網站上花費的時間。這些數據會以直觀和互動的方式顯示。瞭解您的瀏覽情況，避免分心! 注重隱私：您的數據永遠不會離開您的電腦!
localize.tagline: 追蹤、可視化並分析您在網上花費的時間。

next.excerpt: The Collections database consists of entries for more than 480,000 works in the Musée du Louvre and Musée National Eugène-Delacroix. Updated on a daily basis, it is the result of the continuous research and documentation efforts carried out by both museums.
next.title: Louvre Museum Online - Explore the entirety of the Louvre's collection for free

localize.description: 藏品数据库包括卢浮宫博物馆和欧仁-德拉克洛瓦国家博物馆480,000多件作品的条目。该数据库每天更新，是两个博物馆不断进行研究和文献工作的结果。
localize.tagline: 免费探索卢浮宫的全部藏品。

localize.description: 藏品數據庫包括盧浮宮博物館和歐仁-德拉克洛瓦國家博物館480,000多件作品的條目。該數據庫每天更新，是兩個博物館不斷進行研究和文獻工作的結果。
localize.tagline: 免費探索盧浮宮的全部藏品。
